code: import{UPDATE_CART,CLEAR_CART_TOTAL}from'./actionTypes';export var updateCart=function updateCart(cartProducts){return function(dispatch){var productQuantity=cartProducts.reduce(function(sum,p){sum+=p.quantity;return sum;},0);var totalPrice=cartProducts.reduce(function(sum,p){sum+=p.price*p.quantity;return sum;},0);var installments=cartProducts.reduce(function(greater,p){greater=p.installments>greater?p.installments:greater;return greater;},0);var cartTotal={productQuantity:productQuantity,installments:installments,totalPrice:totalPrice,currencyId:'USD',currencyFormat:'$'};dispatch({type:UPDATE_CART,payload:cartTotal});};};export var clearCartTotal=function clearCartTotal(){return function(dispatch){dispatch({type:CLEAR_CART_TOTAL,payload:{}});};};
